alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 8:09AM CST until December 14 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SIMPSON AND SOUTHWESTERN SMITH COUNTIES... At 809 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Mount Olive, or near Magee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Simpson and southwestern Smith Counties, including the following locations... Mize. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
